Stripe Terminal Android SDK (v4.3.1)
search in API
external/com.stripe.stripeterminal.external.models/OfflineBehavior

OfflineBehavior

enum OfflineBehavior : Enum<OfflineBehavior>

The OfflineBehavior allows you to configure how the Terminal SDK should handle the specified PaymentIntent while unable to reach stripe.com.

Use of this SDK is subject to the Stripe Terminal Terms: https://stripe.com/terminal/legal

Entries

REQUIRE_ONLINE
Link copied to clipboard
REQUIRE_ONLINE

Prevent using the PaymentIntent if the device is currently offline and unable to communicate with stripe.com

PREFER_ONLINE
Link copied to clipboard
PREFER_ONLINE

Attempt to create and collect the PaymentIntent online, but allow offline handling if the device cannot reach stripe.com.

FORCE_OFFLINE
Link copied to clipboard
FORCE_OFFLINE

Create and collect this PaymentIntent offline, without attempting to communicate with stripe.com.
